articles.title: KPA Supreme Command Sends Ultimatum to S. Korean Puppet Forces
articles.content:
KPA Supreme Command Sends Ultimatum to S. Korean Puppet Forces
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The supreme command of the Korean People's Army issued the following ultimatum to the south Korean puppet forces on Tuesday:
					The world is in a festive mood on the auspicious Day of the Sun.
					
					Even though an acute situation is prevailing in the DPRK, all the people are celebrating the Day of the Sun as the greatest national holiday.
					
					It is only the south Korean puppet forces who hurled a group of anti-communist gangsters into a rally against the DPRK in the heart of Seoul in broad daylight at which they set fire to the portraits, the symbols of its supreme dignity, the thrice-cursed crime.
					
					All the service personnel and people of the DPRK are simmering with towering resentment at this monstrous criminal act.
					
					In view of this situation the Supreme Command of the KPA sends the following ultimatum to the south Korean puppet forces:
					
					1.  Our retaliatory action will start without any notice from now as such thrice-cursed criminal act of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK is being openly committed in the heart of Seoul under the patronage of the puppet authorities.
					
					To be included in the targets of retaliation are those directly or indirectly involved in the operation to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and those who instigated the perpetrators and connived their crime and the relevant organs and departments of the authorities involved.
					
					2. The DPRK's revolutionary armed forces will start immediately their just military actions to show how the service personnel and people of the DPRK value and protect the dignity of the supreme leadership.
					
					The military demonstration of the DPRK's revolutionary armed forces will be powerful sledge-hammer blows at all hostile forces hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					3. If the puppet authorities truly want dialogue and negotiations, they should apologize for all anti-DPRK hostile acts, big and small, and show the compatriots their will to stop all these acts in practice.

articles.title: DPRK FM Spokesman Dismisses U.S. Talk about Dialogue as Rhetoric Misleading World Opinion
articles.content:
DPRK FM Spokesman Dismisses U.S. Talk about Dialogue as Rhetoric Misleading World Opinion
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry issued the following statement on Tuesday:
					Recently U.S. high-ranking officials are vying with each other to talk about dialogue. This is nothing but a crafty ploy to evade the blame for the tension on the eve of a war by pretending to refrain from military actions and stand for dialogue.
					
					It is none other than the U.S which sparked off a vicious cycle of tension, pursuant to its hostile policy to stifle the DPRK by force of arms, and pushed the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the worst phase. The tension began escalating there due to the U.S. wanton violation of the DPRK's right to satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					There is no country in the world which does not react to the encroachment upon the legitimate right of a sovereign state to develop space and its sovereignty. The nuclear war maneuvers staged by the U.S. against the DPRK in the wake of its prodding of the UN Security Council into the cooking up of brigandish "resolutions on sanctions" one after another compelled the latter to clarify its stand to take military countermeasures for self-defence.
					
					One may know well who is to blame for the tension when looking into who benefits from this.
					
					The U.S. benefited from drastically increasing its military deployment pursuant to its Asia-Pacific-pivot strategy by massively introducing all latest weaponry while inciting military confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					The U.S., which regards the DPRK as the primary target of its attack in the Asia-Pacific region, not only deployed all its operational nuclear strike means but also posed the threat of the largest-ever physical nuclear strike to the DPRK in recent months.
					
					It openly introduced strategic nuclear subs out of its three major strategic nuclear strike means into the waters off the Korean Peninsula, and let its strategic bombers openly make sorties into the sky of the peninsula for drills of dropping nukes.
					
					The third strategic nuclear strike means, the inter-continental ballistic missile launch, was reportedly postponed for the time being, but it is scheduled for May.
					
					Even now the U.S. is letting its nuclear-powered carrier strike groups operate in waters off the peninsula, staging ceaseless DPRK-targeted nuclear war drills.
					
					It is the height of rhetoric intended to mislead the world opinion to talk about dialogue for dismantling the DPRK's nuclear deterrent under this situation.
					
					The U.S. is sadly mistaken if it calculates the DPRK will pay slightest heed to such talk about dialogue as a robber's calling for a negotiated solution while brandishing his gun.
					
					Worse still, the U.S. claim that it will opt for dialogue when the DPRK shows its will for denuclearization first is a very impudent hostile act of disregarding the line of the Workers' Party of Korea and the law of the DPRK.
					
					The DPRK is not opposed to dialogue but has no idea of sitting at the humiliating negotiating table with the party brandishing a nuclear stick. 
					
					Dialogue should be based on the principle of respecting sovereignty and equality--this is the DPRK's consistent stand.
					
					Genuine dialogue is possible only at the phase where the DPRK has acquired nuclear deterrent enough to defuse the U.S. threat of nuclear war unless the U.S. rolls back its hostile policy and nuclear threat and blackmail against the former. 
					
					This time when the DPRK has been exposed to the U.S. direct and substantial threat of nuclear attack, it keenly felt the need to bolster up its nuclear deterrence both in quality and quantity.
					
					It is quite natural for the DPRK to take counteractions for self-defence by beefing up nuclear force now that the U.S., world's biggest nuclear weapons state, threatens and blackmails the former with a nuclear stick.
					
					The nuclear strike drills staged by the U.S. against the DPRK leave the latter with no option but to conduct drills to cope with them.
					
					There is no guarantee that these drills will not go over to a real war and the U.S. will be held wholly accountable for all the ensuing consequences. 
					
					The DPRK will escalate its military countermeasures for self-defence unless the U.S. ceases its nuclear war drills and withdraws all its war hardware for aggression.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Congratulates Syria's Independence Day
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Congratulates Syria's Independence Day
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Bashar Al-Assad, president of Syria.
					The message extended warm congratulations to the president, government and people of Syria on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of Syria's independence, the significant national holiday of the Syrian people.
					
					Expressing belief that the excellent bonds of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger, the message wished the president and people of Syria success in their just struggle for defending the sovereignty of the country and achieving peace and stability.

articles.title: DPRK, Cuba Sign Agreement on Cultural Exchange
articles.content:
DPRK, Cuba Sign Agreement on Cultural Exchange
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- A 2013-2016 agreement on cultural exchange between the governments of the DPRK and Cuba was inked in Havana on April 11.
					Present at the signing ceremony from the DPRK side were Jon Yong Jin, DPRK ambassador to Cuba, and his embassy officials and from the Cuban side the minister of Culture and officials concerned.
					
					Jon Yong Jin and the Cuban minister of Culture signed the agreement.

articles.title: Greetings to Venezuelan President-elect
articles.content:
Greetings to Venezuelan President-elect
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Monday sent a message of greeting to Nicolas Maduro Moros, president-elect of Venezuela.
					The message said that his election as president of Venezuela is an expression of the deep trust and expectation of the Venezuelan people for him and a manifestation of the steadfast will of the Venezuelan people to keep to the road of socialism.
					
					It wholeheartedly wished the president great success in his responsible work for defending the sovereignty of the country and achieving the wellbeing of the people, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in all fields.

articles.title: Greetings to Syrian PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Syrian PM
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju on Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Wael Nader Al Halqi, prime minister of Syria, on the occasion of the 67th independence day of Syria.
					The message wished the prime minister and his government many successes in their work for the sovereignty of the country and its stability and economic recovery.
					
					DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a message of greeting to Walid Al-Muallem, deputy prime minister and minister of Foreign Affairs and Expatriates, on the same day.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves for Iran
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves for Iran
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the international exhibition of the Ministry of Oil Industry headed by Minister Pae Hak left here on Tuesday to take part in the 18th international exhibition of oil, gas and refined and petro-chemical goods to be held in Tehran.
					Going back home on the same day were players of South Africa, Zimbabwe, Kenya, Namibia, Ethiopia and Egypt who participated in the IAAF-26th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon.
					
					Earlier, the players of Ukraine, Italy, Madagascar and other countries left here for home.

articles.title: DPRK Players Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Players Back Home
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- DPRK players returned home on Tuesday after participating in the 2013 World Juvenile Weightlifting Championships.
					They were greeted by officials concerned at Pyongyang Railway Station.
					
					Sportspersons and Pyongyangites put fragrant garlands around the necks of players and presented them with bouquets, congratulating them on their success in the games.
					
					The players were interviewed with reporters that day.
					
					At the press conference, the players and coaches vowed to display the honor of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea by bagging many gold medals at international games. 
					
					Meanwhile, players came back home after taking part in the 2013 World Short-Track Speed Skating Tournament for Development Cup of the International Skating Union.

articles.title: Foreigners, Overseas Koreans Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Foreigners, Overseas Koreans Visit Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Foreigners and overseas Koreans taking part in the 15th Kimilsungia Festival visited Mangyongdae.
					They went round historic relics in the old home, being briefed on the revolutionary life of President Kim Il Sung and his family members in Mangyongdae.
					
					The vice-chairman of a branch of the Chinese Flower Association said that he was deeply moved to visit the old home in Mangyongdae where the President was born, adding he devoted his whole life to the country and people. 
					
					The vice-president of Yanbian University of Science and Technology said:
					
					Whenever I visit the old home in Mangyongdae, I miss the President.
					
					He was the father of socialist Korea and the nation.
					
					He is always alive in the hearts of all of us.
					
					I will positively contribute to the prosperity of the homeland under the dear respected Kim Jong Un, true to the behests of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					They also visited the venue of the 15th Kimilsungia Festival, International Friendship Exhibition House, National Gifts Exhibition House, Pyongyang Folklore Park and other places.

articles.title: Doctorate Awarded to IIJI Secretary General
articles.content:
Doctorate Awarded to IIJI Secretary General
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Doctorate in Philosophy of the DPRK was awarded to Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea.
					He contributed to explaining and proving the validity of the idea and theory of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, who formulated the Juche idea and the Songun idea founded and developed in depth by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on the occasion of the 101st birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung.
					
					A ceremony took place at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Tours Construction Sites of Key Projects for Marking War Victory Day
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Tours Construction Sites of Key Projects for Marking War Victory Day
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Director of the General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army Choe Ryong Hae visited the construction sites of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum and the cemetery of fallen KPA soldiers to learn about the progress made in the construction.
					They are key projects for the celebration of the 60th anniversary for the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					Servicepersons, officials in the field of the construction in the capital and members of shock brigades have made innovations at construction sites in the spirit of frustrating the U.S. imperialists and their followers' moves for stifling the DPRK in hearty response to the March, 2013 plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					Choe went round several places of the construction sites replete with the revolutionary army's offensive spirit of "at a go".
					
					He stressed the need to finish the construction in a brief span of time and green the areas around the construction sites in the spirit of successfully implementing the instructions of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					He called on all the soldier-builders to perform feats in carrying out their duty and become victors in the do-or-die battle with the U.S. imperialists by keeping pace with the Supreme Commander's patriotic footsteps.

articles.title: DPRK Skaters Prove Successful at World Short Track Speed Skating
articles.content:
DPRK Skaters Prove Successful at World Short Track Speed Skating
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The 2013 World Short Track Speed Skating Tournament for Development Cup of the International Skating Union (ISU) took place, divided into three stages.
					The first stage was held in Poland from Mar. 26 to 30 and the third is due in Philippines from Apr. 16 to 20.
					
					The second stage took place in Singapore.
					
					The tournament, which was held from April 9 to 13, divided into juvenile group (15-18), junior group C (13-14) and junior group D (11-12), brought together more than 40 skaters of different countries including the DPRK.
					
					It draws interest of professional skaters and fans, being the first organized by the ISU.
					
					The DPRK skaters bagged four medals in the tournament.
					
					Ri Ji Ryon (juvenile group) and Kim Kum Hyang (junior group C) lifted trophies in women's 500m and 1,000m categories.

articles.title: DPRK Weightlifters Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
DPRK Weightlifters Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- DPRK players, who proved successful at the 2013 World Juvenile Weightlifting Championships, visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Tuesday.
					They laid bunches of flowers before the statues and made bows.

articles.title: Group, Separate Performances Held
articles.content:
Group, Separate Performances Held
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Group and separate performances of the Third April Spring People's Art Festival took place at theaters, music halls and cultural houses here on Tuesday.
					Pyongyangites, overseas Koreans and foreign guests appreciated performances.
					
					The orchestras of the National Symphony Orchestra drew capacity audiences at the Moranbong Theater. 
					
					Put on the stage were such numbers as string music ensemble "The Leader Has Come to Our Post" and orchestra "Our General Is Best". 
					
					The art troupes of South Hwanghae and North Hamgyong provinces and the art troupe of Koreans in Japan gave separate performances at the Pyongyang Grand Theater. The art troupe of Koreans in China presented a separate performance at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre.
					
					The art troupe of Koreans in the U.S. gave a performance at Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory.
					
					Circus drama "Tale of Chun Hyang" was given at the Pyongyang Circus Theatre.
					
					Separate performances of the festival of art squads, itinerant art squads of   factories and art groups of workers were given at the Pothonggang Circus Theatre, the National Theatre, Pyongyang International Cinema House, the Central Youth Hall and other places and the repertoires included a variety of narrative pieces, songs and dances.
					
					The performers sang high praises of the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who ushered in the new era of prosperity to this land by leading the party and the revolution to the road of victory with their rare wisdom, outstanding leadership ability and noble traits as well as the personality of the dear respected Kim Jong Un as a great man.
					
					They also gave the artistic representation of the worthwhile labor of working people and the proud change of the country.

articles.title: Koreans Vow to Give Deal to S. Korean Traitors
articles.content:
Koreans Vow to Give Deal to S. Korean Traitors
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK are trembling with anger at the hideous criminal act of the south Korean group of gangsters who hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					Kim Song Nam, teacher of Kim Chaek University of Technology, said as follows:
					
					It is an unpardonable big treason that the devilish enemies hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK on the Day of the Sun.
					
					The enemies made no hesitation of insulting portraits of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu which the Koreans have deeply cherished in their hearts.
					
					It is a hideous provocative act unprecedented in history that they played with edged tools on the day celebrated by the nation as a significant holiday.
					
					The present south Korean authorities connived at the big treason that was held in downtown Seoul in broad daylight. They are a group of traitors like Lee Myung Bak who was thrown into the garbage of history.
					
					The group of gangsters who are utterly disregarding the history and the nation should be forced to meet death by dismemberment.
					
					Ryom Song Chol, officer of the Korean People's Army, branding the act of having hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK as a despicable act of those who plunge into fire with faggots on their back, said:
					
					The present regime of south Korea is whetting the sword for confrontation with fellow countrymen, taking the advantage of its master's anti-DPRK moves just like the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors which was thrown into the dumping ground of history.
					
					The regime has staged a nuclear war racket targeting the fellow countrymen in April, a month celebrated by the nation as the most auspicious season, and even committed the hideous act of confrontation hurting the valuable dignity of the DPRK. How can they be allowed to go unpunished.
					
					Anger has mounted among the army of the DPRK at the news of act hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the country by the south Korean gangsters.
					
					The best option for us in defending the dignity of our supreme leadership, our lifeline, is a practical military action for severely punishing the group of traitors.
					
					They can not be pardoned.
					
					They should be made to pay a dear price for their hideous criminal act.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts S. Korean Puppet Forces for Hurting Dignity of DPRK's Supreme Leadership
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts S. Korean Puppet Forces for Hurting Dignity of DPRK's Supreme Leadership
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- A monstrous crime that shocked the Korean nation and the progressive mankind was committed in south Korea on the Day of the Sun, the greatest holiday of the Koreans.
					The south Korean puppet forces mobilized gangsters to hold an anti-DPRK rally in downtown Seoul and torch portraits of great men symbolic of the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. 
					
					This is an intolerable and shuddering act.
					
					Now a touch-and-go situation has been created on the Korean Peninsula due to the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces' anti-DPRK moves.
					
					Despite this acute situation, the Day of the Sun is being celebrated as an auspicious event of the nation and the world, reflective of the unanimous desire of the Korean nation and the world progressives.
					
					The puppet forces, however, are finding fault with the events for celebrating the Day of the Sun while stepping up the campaign for a war against the DPRK in collusion with the U.S. master in response to the just and toughest measures taken by the army and people of the DPRK to defend its sovereignty and the dignity. They made no hesitation of hurting the dignity of the DPRK, a thrice-cursed hideous provocation.
					
					The puppet group instigated the reptile media to create an extreme warlike situation and speak ill of the DPRK's festive mood for the celebration of the Day of the Sun.
					
					The Day of the Sun has historically been celebrated as the greatest holiday of the nation. But the south Korean forces reviled at it, calling it a "demonstration of the validity of the social system" and an "intention to rally local peoole."
					
					They even talked about the "trouble" faced by the supreme headquarters of the DPRK in the wake of the "south side's proposal for dialogue".
					
					On April 15, the south Korean chief executive at a grand mass made such a nonsensical remark that "if the north makes a correct option, the south will take the road of common progress."
					
					The puppet forces committed the bullying acts of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK in downtown Seoul in broad daylight. Still they speak loudly of dialogue in public, the height of folly.
					
					The present south Korean ruling forces are going on the rampage, trying to make a political provocation and staging war exercises against the DPRK in alignment with the U.S. This proves that they are a group of traitors little different from the Lee Myung Bak group.
					
					The fuse of a war is now burning on due to the reckless moves of the puppet forces that are making ceaseless provocations, steadily escalating the situation on the Korean Peninsula to realize their design for the aggression of the DPRK.
					
					As the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army stated in the ultimatum, the military demonstration of the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will become a sledge-hammer blow at the hostile forces of all stripes that hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					The criminals have already jumped into fire with faggots on their back. They will have hardest time till the DPRK's retaliatory action starts without notice.
					
					The gangsters who took part in the criminal act will be made to blame themselves for harsh punishment that will be meted out to them.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Call for Peace Agreement
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Call for Peace Agreement
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the Seoul Reunification Solidarity and the People's Action for Realizing Peace against War held a press conference in Seoul on Monday as regards the visit of the U.S. secretary of State to south Korea.
					The organizations said that the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK is the main cause of escalating military tension on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The U.S. is busy stepping up arms buildup and holding drills of a war for aggression instead of seeking a negotiated and peaceful settlement of the issue of the peninsula, they said, adding:
					
					Unless the distrust and hostile relations between the DPRK and the U.S. are removed, the danger of a war will remain. Therefore, the U.S. should drop its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					The U.S. should stop the joint military drills against the north and opt for a dialogue for concluding a peace agreement with no strings attached, they held.

articles.title: Realization of S. Korean Workers' Rights Called for
articles.content:
Realization of S. Korean Workers' Rights Called for
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Organizations of the Confederation of Trade Unions, including the public transport trade union,  employees' trade union, teachers trade union, university trade union, public health and medical trade union and media trade union, held a press conference in Seoul on April 11 to form the headquarters of joint action to win basic labor rights in the public field of the Confederation of Trade Unions, check privatization and strengthen public community.
					At the press conference, the speakers denounced the Lee Myung Bak regime for having trampled down the basic rights of the workers in the public field during its office.
					
					In particular, corruption, irregularities and actions for seeking profits are prevalent in the fields of education and public health and the misfortune and pain of part-time workers have become extreme, they said, adding:
					
					This treacherous rule is being followed by the present regime which is keen on the moves of privatization to turn the public field into a means of moneymaking for businessmen.
					
					They called for protesting against the "government's" privatization, rallied around the headquarters.
					
					They vowed to stage the struggle to realize the workers' rights, get the discrimination against part-time workers abolished and check privatization with concerted efforts.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreigners
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreigners
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Various events were held in foreign countries on the occasions of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission from April 5 to 9.
					They included meetings in Bulgaria, South Africa and Mexico and lectures in the Czech Republic, Russia and Mongolia.
					
					The chief of the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said in a speech that the President was a benevolent father of people and a great leader of the international labor movement who devoted his all to freedom and happiness of the people and the cause of global independence.
					
					The general secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party said the DPRK could invariably defend socialism under any hard circumstances and won the honor as a powerful socialist country which no country dares provoke thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					The chairman of the Karelia-DPRK Friendship Association of Russia lauded the President as the sun of all people famous for his outstanding idea, extraordinary leadership and great charisma that glorified a century.
					
					The section chief of the Mongolian Institute for Strategic Studies said in a lecture that the President had held fast to the independent line since his early days of revolutionary activities and they were struck with admiration at the Korean people, who value independence as the their life and soul, standing firm in the confrontation with the U.S.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked in Foreign Countries
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- A meeting, seminar, book and photo exhibition were held in Denmark, UK, Democratic Congo and Ethiopia to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung between April 1 and 6.
					Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, said in a speech at the meeting that the President founded the immortal Juche idea and led two revolutionary wars, rehabilitation and reconstruction, two-stage social revolution and socialist construction.
					
					Leader Kim Jong Il enriched the Juche idea and defended the dignity of the country and nation with his original Songun politics.
					
					The revolutionary cause of Juche is being creditably carried forward by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					Michael Chant, general secretary of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), reported: The President beat back two imperialists in one generation and built the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence. Under the leadership of Kim Jong Un the army and people of the DPRK will surely realize the behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					Rohekele Andre, national chairman of the Working Citizens' Association of Democratic Congo and chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo, said all of them should grasp the greatness of the President and learn after the DPRK advancing along the road of Juche.
					
					Letters to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events in Denmark and the UK.

articles.title: Russian Papers Introduce DPRK
articles.content:
Russian Papers Introduce DPRK
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Russian papers carried special write-ups to mark the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					Nakhodkinski Rabochi on Mar. 21 carried an article titled "Kim Jong Il regarded great unity between army and people as national power" with his photo.
					
					He paid particular attention to getting the service personnel ready politically and ideologically, making it possible for the Korean People's Army to become a matchless army, the article said, and went on:
					
					He trained them with the peculiar strategy and tactics and directed great efforts to developing the national defence industry to manufacture combat equipment domestically.
					
					He did not consider the unity between army and people as a mere means of giving help to each other but a great force and believed that no force in the world can match the single-minded unity.
					
					The 13th issue of Patriot carried an article titled "Songun, guarantee for sovereignty" illustrated with photos of Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					The article referred to the essence, validity and great vitality of the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il.
					
					The DPRK has thwarted the imperialists' ambition to dominate the world and emerged as an indomitable stronghold of socialism in reliance on the Songun politics, strong Korean People's Army and the harmonious whole of the army and people, the paper stressed.

articles.title: Indonesian Paper Marks DPRK Anniversaries
articles.content:
Indonesian Paper Marks DPRK Anniversaries
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- International Media, a newspaper of Indonesia, on April 8 carried special write-ups on the occasions of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and the 1st anniversaries of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's election to the top posts of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state.
					The paper dedicated a whole page to articles illustrated with a portrait of the smiling President.
					
					The article titled "Eternal sun" said that the President enjoyed the boundless reverence from progressive mankind as the sun of Juche.
					
					The article titled "Songun politics and Korean Peninsula" said:
					
					The Songun politics is a basic mode of politics in socialist Korea.
					
					Kim Jong Il upheld the banner of Songun to cope with the extreme anti-socialist offensive by the imperialist allied forces.
					
					With this, he put forward a new line of economic construction as demanded by the era and encouraged the army and people to turn out in defending socialism by making an atmosphere of attaching importance to the military affairs sweep whole society and consolidating the traditional unity between the army and people.
					
					The Songun politics prompted the Koreans' national cause of reunification.
					
					Peace and security on the Korean Peninsula are ensured by the might of Songun in socialist Korea, not by the nuclear umbrella of the U.S.
					
					The Songun politics is being carried on by supreme leader Kim Jong Un and Korea is to be reunified before long.

articles.title: Bulgarian Social Body Issues Special Bulletin
articles.content:
Bulgarian Social Body Issues Special Bulletin
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association released a special bulletin on April 5 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					It carried a picture of the smiling President and articles.
					
					It said in an article titled "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" that he published great many famous works by conducting energetic ideo-theoretical activities all his life.
					
					It also noted that the complete collection in 100 volumes, which deals with all of his works, was published in the DPRK.
					
					It cited facts to prove the deep reverence of foreign heads of state and prominent figures for him under the title "Toast of Stalin".
					
					It mentioned the grave situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula that was caused by the anti-DPRK moves of the U.S. and its allies under the title "Latest" while carrying the gists of the March 26 statement of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army and the statement of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK.

articles.title: Egyptian Party Expresses Solidarity for Struggle of DPRK's People
articles.content:
Egyptian Party Expresses Solidarity for Struggle of DPRK's People
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The Arab Socialist Party of Egypt issued a statement on April 7 condemning the U.S. moves to stifle the DPRK.
					The statement said:
					
					The Korean people's access to nukes is a legitimate right to self-defence.
					
					That the DPRK fired up graphite-moderated reactor again is in line with the new strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					The escalation of the war threat on the Korean Peninsula is undoubtedly caused by the U.S. intention for aggression.
					
					One of the striking examples is the involvement of U.S. nuclear strategic bombers in the joint military drills now under way in the peninsula.
					
					This compels the DPRK to take steps to defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country.
					
					The party expresses full solidarity with the Korean people in the efforts for defending the dignity of the nation.
					
					It wishes the Workers' Party of Korea greater success in its struggle under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK.
					
					We also hope that the Korean people will reunify the divided country without fail.

articles.title: Foreign Party, Bodies Condemn U.S. Anti-DPRK Moves
articles.content:
Foreign Party, Bodies Condemn U.S. Anti-DPRK Moves
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Political party and organizations of Bulgaria and the Czech Republic issued statements on April 9 in denunciation of the U.S. anti-DPRK moves.
					The Plovdiv City Council of the Bulgarian Socialist Party and the Plovdiv City Council of the Bulgarian Anti-Fascism Union in a joint statement said:
					
					We are watching the development of the situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula with serious concern.
					
					Korea was partitioned due to the interference of foreign forces against the reunification of the country.
					
					The U.S., which provoked the Korean War in 1950, is still escalating the tension on the peninsula.
					
					The U.S. is still opposed to withdrawing its armed forces from south Korea.
					
					We back the stance of the DPRK to have foreign forces withdrawn from south Korea and peacefully settle the issue of reunification by pooling efforts of the Koreans.
					
					The Paektusan Czech-Korea Friendship Association said in its statement:
					
					We bitterly condemn the U.S. and its allies for escalating the tension on the peninsula to an extreme pitch.
					
					We demand the U.S. halt such a provocative and dangerous military drill at once and pull its troops out of the peninsula.
					
					We fully support the measures taken by the DPRK to cope with moves of the imperialist big powers which, together with its followers, turned the peninsula into a place of exhibition of nukes, creating the state of war.
					
					We are convinced that the Korean people will surely achieve the peaceful development under the wise leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Just Struggle of DPRK's People Hailed by Jordanian Paper
articles.content:
Just Struggle of DPRK's People Hailed by Jordanian Paper
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The Jordanian paper Al Diyar hailed the just and sacred struggle of the Korean people to defend the sovereignty of the country and the nation on Mar. 14 and 31.
					The paper under the title "U.S.-targeted nuclear-capable missiles of DPRK" said:
					
					The DPRK declared the state of war between the north and the south of Korea as part of the decisive counter-measures against the U.S. and the south Korean authorities keen on hurting the supreme dignity of the DPRK.
					
					The steps of the DPRK are very just.
					
					The world already knows that the Korean people never say empty words.
					
					It knows well that the provocation against the DPRK will trigger off an all-out nuclear war and that the U.S., south Korea and Japan will never be able to escape the strikes of the DPRK.
					
					The people of the DPRK will mercilessly wipe out the U.S. and its allies in the death-and-life war to defend their sovereignty.
					
					Under the title of "Impregnable fortress DPRK", the paper condemned the U.S. for having illegally masterminded the UN Security Council to adopt "resolutions on sanctions" against the DPRK.
					
					All the practices of the U.S. mentioned above show well its abuse of the UN to justify aggression against other countries.
					
					The DPRK will never pardon the enemies' war drills and sanctions against it, but deal merciless blows at them.

articles.title: Statements of DPRK Backed by Kyrgyz Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Statements of DPRK Backed by Kyrgyz Political Party Leader
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgys El" Republican Political Party released a statement on April 6 in support of the statements of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army and the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK.
					He, in the statement, criticized the U.S. for using B-52 and other nuclear-capable military hardware in the nuclear war maneuvers in south Korea.
					
					Groundlessly denouncing the DPRK for its satellite launch for peaceful purposes and underground nuclear test, the U.S. cooked up "resolutions on sanctions" against the DPRK in succession by abusing the UN Security Council, and then started the largest-ever joint military drills with south Korea, he noted.
					
					He went on:
					
					It is clear to all that the U.S. is seeking to stifle the DPRK by force of arms at any cost.
					
					It is an extremely just self-defensive measure that the strike forces of the KPA were put under class-A combat readiness under the prevailing situation.
					
					We extend firm solidarity to the Korean people's struggle to defend their country from the U.S. aggression, and fully support all of the measures taken by the DPRK.
					
					I am convinced that the Korean people are sure to win a final victory under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Poland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Poland
Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" was published in booklet by the Kawdruk Publishing House of Poland on April 10.
					The work, published on April 15, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies that the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proves the truth that outstanding leaders assure the dignity and prosperity of the country and nation.
					
					It expounds the idea that the ever-victorious history of the Korean People's Army has assured the glorious 100-year history of Juche Korea and that it will provide a sure guarantee for the eternal history of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					It sets forth the tasks to be fulfilled to demonstrate the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully carry out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un ve competencias deportivas de profesores y empleados de academias militares
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un ve competencias deportivas de profesores y empleados de academias militares
Pyongyang, 16 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del día de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung, tuvieron lugar el día 15 las competencias deportivas de los profesores y empleados de academias militares.
					Apareció a la gradería el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comité de Defensa Nacional de la República Popular Democrática de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejército Popular de Corea.
					
					Disfrutaron los juegos Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyok Sik, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Kyong Ok, Hwang Pyong So, generales y oficiales del Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, profesores, empleados y cadetes de academias militares, funcionarios, periodistas, redactores, creadores y artistas de ramas de prensa e información, literatura y arte dentro del EPC.
					
					Primeramente, se desarrolló la competencia de voleibol entre los equipos de la Academia Militar General Kim Il Sung y la Academia Militar Política Kim Il Sung, en la cual la primera se adjudicó primera.
					
					Acto seguido, se realizó el partido de baloncesto entre los equipos de los mismos planteles docentes, en el cual los jugadores demostraron bien sus habilidades.
					
					Cada vez que los jugadores mostraban excelentes aspectos con hábiles movimientos, el Comandante Supremo les estimuló dándoles aplausos.
					
					En la competencia, también el primer plantel logró victoria.
					
					El mismo día, tuvieron lugar también los juegos de ajedrez y de lucha de cuerda.
					
					En el ajedrez, la primera triunfó y en la lucha de cuerda, la segunda ganó victoria.
					
					Tras mostrarse muy satisfecho de que las competencias deportivas de los profesores y empleados de academias militares se hayan efectuado excelentemente, el Mariscal dio saludo a los jugadores quienes mostraron el espíritu colectivo y la noble moral en las competencias.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia concierto de la Orquesta Unhasu
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia concierto de la Orquesta Unhasu
Pyongyang, 16 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 15 en el Teatro del Pueblo el concierto de la Orquesta Unhasu en homenaje al dia del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					Salio al palco el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Lo disfrutaron Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Kyong Hui, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Kang Sok Ju y Kwak Pom Gi junto con trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					En la escena iniciada con la interpretacion del "Himno nacional" se pusieron el sexteto mixto "Cantemos el Dia del Sol", el solo masculino y pangchang "Viva el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung" y otras piezas.
					
					Los ejecutantes elogiaron altamente las hazanas del Generalisimo Kim Il Sung quien durante toda su vida enarbolo la bandera del Songun y, con destacada idea, sabia direccion y noble virtud, condujo a la victoria la causa de independencia antiimperialista y la del socialismo.
					
					Cada vez que aparecia en el fondo de escena la imagen del Presidente, los espectadores no detuvieron sus emociones.
					
					El duo de instrumento nacional "Tres mil ries de vinalon", el coro mixto "!Superemos en todo los niveles de punta!" y otras piezas reflejaron bien que gracias a la sabia direccion del Generalisimo Kim Jong Il quien quedo fiel a la idea y la causa del Presidente, se pusieron de pleno manifiesto a todo el mundo la dignidad y el impetu de la nacion del Sol y se asento el fidedigno cimiento para la prosperidad eterna de Corea del Juche.
					
					El solo femenino y pangchang masculino "Gloria de la vida", el solo femenino y pangchang "Adelante Corea hacia el desarrollo paralelo", etc. llevaron al climax la funcion.
					
					Termino con el coro mixto "Quien se encarga de nuestro destino y futuro" el concierto, que demostro con ricos cuadros artisticos la voluntad de todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de enaltecer siempre a los grandes Generalisimos y lograr la victoria final en la confrontacion total con Estados Unidos y en la construccion de un Estado prospero uniendose compactamente en torno al Mariscal.
					
					El Mariscal felicito el exito de la funcion respondiendo cordialmente a las efusivas aclamaciones de los ejecutantes y  espectadores.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a presidente sirio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a presidente sirio
Pyongyang, 16 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 16 un mensaje de felicitacion a Bashar al-Assad, presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					En ocasion del 67o aniversario de la independencia de Siria, significativa fiesta nacional de su pueblo, hago llegar mi calurosa felicitacion a Vd., al gobierno y al pueblo de la Republica Arabe de Siria. 
					
					Convencido de que se consolidaran y se desarrollaran de continuo los excelentes lazos de amistad y cooperacion existentes entre nuestros dos paises, deseo a Vd. y a su pueblo arabe de Siria exitos en su lucha justa por defender la soberania del pais y lograr la paz y la estabilidad.
